properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 2 at 2:48AM PST until March 3 at 9:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas
11 to 16 feet at 17 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 9 PM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST TUESDAY
